question: Thank you so much for your answers! At this point in the survey, you have completed the minimum amount required to participate in ManyDogs Study 1, and can choose to submit your information now by selecting "Submit my info now". If you would like to tell us more about your dog, we would love to hear all about them! We have prepared several more questions about their behaviour that you can answer by selecting "More questions please", this will take approximately 12-15 minutes.
possibleResponseValues: Yes (Continue to take full C-BARQ), No (Decline to complete full C-BARQ), NA
